mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_IMG, TITLE, CONTENT, SUBTEXT, START_DATE, END_DATE, REGDATE, UPDATE_DATE, WRITER, EVENT_PW FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(HOSINSA_BOARD_EVENT PK_HOSINSA_BOARD_EVENT) */ ROWNUM RN, EVENT_NO, EVENT_IMG, TITLE, SUBTEXT, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, REGDATE, UPDATE_DATE, WRITER, EVENT_PW FROM HOSINSA_BOARD_EVENT WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO HOSINSA_BOARD_EVENT(EVENT_NO, EVENT_IMG, TITLE, SUBTEXT, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, REGDATE, UPDATE_DATE, WRITER, EVENT_PW) VALUES(#{event_no}, #{event_img}, #{title}, #{subtext}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{writer}, #{event_pw})
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSINSA_BOARD_EVENT SET EVENT_IMG = #{event_img}, TITLE = #{title}, SUBTEXT = #{subtext}, CONTENT = #{content}, START_DATE = #{start_date}, END_DATE = #{end_date}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EVENT_NO = #{event_no}
